channel.title: Uptate?
channel.description: as 1.7 update is up, i uptated expecting to use the new stuff in the server, but it says server out of date, and now, i can't get in the server and can't return to 1.6. can someone help me either telling me when the server updates or how to return to 1.6?

item.title: Uptate?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Wait Tabbykiller is banned?
I’d upload my 1.6.6 but for some reason it is not working on other pcs.

Read full topic

item.title: Uptate?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:12, topic:401738”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=498795.msg3647959#msg3647959 date=1309528417]

[quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=498795.msg3647853#msg3647853 date=1309520210]

Why doesn’t mitb just make his own Bukkit and mods?
[/quote]It’s not bukkits fault, notch’s update is just buggy.
[/quote]Yeah, since update 1.6 was epic i was hoping on a better update than just pistons…

A lot of the things planned for 1.7 were pushed back to 1.8. So I imagine 1.8 being a fairly exciting update.[/quote]I hope so.

Read full topic

item.title: Uptate?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Mitb will update the server when bukkit updates its server software as that is the server source that moparcraft runs on.
